title: Hell's Gate: Awakening
description: Adopted from Tokyo, Celeste and her family move to the United States to get away from their past and start a new life together. Everything seems wonderful until at the tender age of fourteen, Celesteâ€™s adoptive mother passes away under mysterious circumstances. Now, years later she has picked up her life and even becomes engaged to the man of her dreams. However, shortly after her 24th birthday strange things begin to happen. The truth of her past is scratching at the surface and once it breaks free, the world may never be the same. Who is she and just where did she come from? Maybe some secrets are better left unknown.
author: Chrystal Anne
